item.title: 图斯克称波兰拘留了八名破坏活动嫌疑人
item.description: 波兰总理唐纳德-图斯克（Donald Tusk）周二在 X 上发帖称，波兰最近几天在全国各地拘留了八名涉嫌准备破坏活动的人。【原文：Poland has detained eight individuals across the country in recent days on suspicion of preparing acts of sabotage, Prime Minister Donald Tusk said in a post on X on Tuesday.】

item.title: 贝莱德和道富基金重新制定规则保留法国债券
item.description: 由全球最大的几家资产管理公司运营的债券基金正在通过改变投资规则来避免被迫出售所持有的法国债务。【原文：Bond funds run by some of the world’s largest asset managers are avoiding forced sales of French debt holdings by changing their investment rules.】

item.title: 两家可口可乐非洲公司将在 26 亿美元的交易中合并
item.description: 可口可乐公司（Coca-Cola HBC AG）将以 26 亿美元收购非洲可口可乐饮料公司（Coca-Cola Beverages Africa）的多数股份，从而成为全球第二大汽水装瓶合作伙伴。【原文：Coca-Cola HBC AG will buy a majority stake in Coca-Cola Beverages Africa for $2.6 billion to create the second-largest bottling partner for the fizzy drink by volume globally.】

item.title: 雅德尼称，石油价格下跌可能导致 10 年期国债收益率触及 3.75
item.description: 华尔街资深研究人员 Ed Yardeni 认为，油价下跌可能会使基准国债收益率回到一年多前的水平。【原文：Falling oil prices may drive benchmark Treasury yields back to levels last seen more than a year ago, according to Wall Street research veteran Ed Yardeni.】

item.title: 避险资金涌入，瑞士法郎接近十年高点
item.description: 由于关税和政治担忧重燃，避风港需求在市场上掀起波澜，瑞士法郎对欧元的汇率正逼近十年来的新高。【原文：The Swiss franc is closing in on a decade high against the euro as haven demand ripples through markets due to renewed tariff and political concerns.】

item.title: 英国预算案前借款超预期 72 亿英镑
item.description: 英国政府在本财政年度前六个月的借贷额比预期高出 72 亿英镑（96 亿美元），这凸显了英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）在即将公布的预算中如何使公共财政重回正轨所面临的挑战。【原文：Britain’s government borrowed £7.2 billion ($9.6 billion) more than forecast in the first six months of the fiscal year, highlighting the challenge facing Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves to get the public finances back on track in her upcoming budget.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称石油复苏将决定沙特财政轨迹
item.description: 国际货币基金组织称，尽管沙特阿拉伯政府在实现 1.2 万亿美元经济多样化方面取得了进展，但油价和产量的反弹将使沙特阿拉伯的财政和经常账户受益最大。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s fiscal and current accounts would benefit most from a rebound in oil prices and production, according to the International Monetary Fund, despite the government’s progress in diversifying the $1.2 trillion economy.】

item.title: 资金冻结后乌干达从世界银行获得 20 亿美元资金
item.description: 世界银行将向乌干达提供超过 20 亿美元的贷款，在因反男女同性恋、双性恋和变性者法律而停止对这个东非国家的支持两年后，世界银行恢复了对该国的优惠贷款。【原文：The World Bank will lend more than $2 billion to Uganda, resuming concessional financing two years after halting support to the East African nation over its anti-LGBTQ laws.】

item.title: 瑞士 9 月对美出口反弹，不惧 39% 的关税
item.description: 瑞士对美国的出口在 9 月份出现反弹，这表明对瑞士商品的需求迄今为止仍经受住了唐纳德-特朗普总统超额关税的影响。【原文：Switzerland’s exports to the US rebounded in September, suggesting demand for its goods is so far withstanding the impact of President Donald Trump’s outsized tariffs.】

item.title: Ares 向迪拜 Property Finder 公司提供债务支持，推动海湾地区信贷发展
item.description: 总部位于迪拜的 Property Finder 公司从 Ares Management 公司获得了 2.5 亿美元的债务，这凸显出阿联酋房地产市场对全球机构基金的吸引力不断上升。【原文：Dubai-based Property Finder secured $250 million in debt from Ares Management, underlining the rising appeal of the United Arab Emirates’ real estate market to global institutional funds.】

item.title: 英镑跌破 1.34 美元，富时 100 指数将延续反弹势头
PayPal 将收购 Carlyle 持有的电子商务公司 Shopware 股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，贝宝控股公司（PayPal Holdings Inc.【原文：PayPal Holdings Inc. is taking over a stake in German digital commerce company Shopware AG from a Carlyle Group Inc. fund, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 据说日本央行离加息越来越近，无需操之过急
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本央行官员认为，即使经济在实现价格目标方面取得进展，也不急于在下周上调基准利率。【原文：Bank of Japan officials are of the view there’s no urgency to hike the benchmark rate next week even as the economy is making progress toward achieving their price target, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本在 "铁娘子 "崇拜者高市的领导下向右转
item.description: 支持刺激经济的保守派人士佐佐江-高市（Sanae Takaichi）即将成为日本首位女首相，她是一位精力充沛的民族主义者，对铁娘子撒切尔夫人（Margaret Thatcher）的强硬政治和铁娘子乐队（Iron Maiden）的重金属音乐情有独钟。【原文：Sanae Takaichi, the pro-stimulus conservative set to become Japan’s first female prime minister, is an energetic nationalist with a soft spot for the hard-nosed politics of Iron Lady Margaret Thatcher and the heavy metal music of Iron Maiden.】

item.title: 日本女首相多喜赢得关键投票，将成为日本首位女首相
item.description: 本周二，高市真奈赢得了日本国会下议院的投票，成为日本首相，这实际上使她成为首位获得国家最高领导职位的女性。【原文：Sanae Takaichi won the lower house of parliament vote to become Japan’s prime minister on Tuesday, effectively making her the first woman to clinch the nation’s top leadership job.】

item.title: 印度信实公司抢占中东石油市场，俄罗斯石油运输受到审查
item.description: 印度信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）上周购买了中东原油，并可能下更多订单，这表明西方国家对俄罗斯原油流动的压力可能开始影响其采购模式。【原文：Indian’s Reliance Industries Ltd. bought Middle Eastern crudes last week and may place more orders, in a sign that Western pressure against Russian flows may be starting to impact its procurement patterns.】

item.title: 特朗普与中国的关系正在改善，但这就够了吗？
item.description:
与习近平的首脑会谈有了新的筹码。【原文：

There’s new leverage to bring to the summit meeting with Xi Jinping.

item.title: 陷入困境的 Ambipar 在巴西和德克萨斯州启动破产申请程序
item.description: 总部位于圣保罗的 Ambipar Participações e Empreendimentos SA 在一份声明中说，该公司已选择在巴西申请破产保护。这一消息为这家陷入困境的废物管理公司在治理问题、评级下调和高管离职等因素推动下的急剧衰退画上了句号。【原文：Sao Paulo-based Ambipar Participações e Empreendimentos SA has opted to file for bankruptcy protection in Brazil, the firm said in a statement. The announcement caps off a steep rout for the struggling waste management company, driven by governance concerns, ratings downgrades and executive exits.】

item.title: 8 家值得关注的欧洲国防科技初创企业
item.description:
欧洲推动停止依赖美军，催生了新一代公司。【原文：

A European push to stop relying on the US military has spawned a new generation of companies.

】

item.title: 尽管欧尔班施加压力，匈牙利仍将维持利率不变：决策指南
item.description: 匈牙利央行将连续第 13 个月维持欧盟最高借贷成本不变，此前决策者们拒绝了政府要求降低借贷成本的呼吁。【原文：Hungary’s central bank is set to leave the European Union’s highest borrowing costs unchanged for the 13th straight month, after policymakers rebuffed government calls to cut them.】

item.title: 雀巢公司失败后，花生过敏突破有望提升 DBV
item.description: 在 Zara Koreishi 八个月大的时候，她第一次吃花生零食时发生了严重的反应。这次经历让她的母亲 "时刻提心吊胆"，她总是随身携带一支或多支 EpiPens，并精心策划任何外出就餐或生日派对。【原文：Zara Koreishi was about eight months old when she had a brutal reaction to her first peanut snack. The ordeal left her mother “always on edge,” keeping one or more EpiPens within reach and carefully planning any restaurant outings or birthday parties.】

item.title: 生命线为欧洲主要科技初创企业基金筹集 4 亿欧元资金
item.description: Lifeline Ventures 募集了 4 亿欧元（约合 4.7 亿美元）资金，在其发现独角兽企业的记录基础上，创建了芬兰最大的投资欧洲技术初创企业的基金。【原文：Lifeline Ventures raised €400 million ($470 million) to create Finland’s biggest fund investing in European technology startups, building on its track record of identifying unicorns.】

item.title: 维萨支持的金融科技公司 Moniepoint 再融资 9000 万美元
item.description: Visa 公司支持的金融科技公司 Moniepoint 又获得了 9000 万美元的投资，以加快该公司的非洲扩张计划，使其最新一轮融资额达到 2 亿美元。【原文：Visa Inc.-backed fintech Moniepoint has raised an additional $90 million in investment to accelerate the startup’s African expansion plans, taking its latest funding round to $200 million.】

item.title: 中美领导人准备贸易谈判，金属走高
item.description: 有迹象表明，中美贸易紧张局势可能在世界前两大经济体领导人会晤前得到缓解，基本金属因此走高。【原文：Base metals edged higher on signs that US-China trade tensions could ease ahead of a meeting between the leaders of the world’s top two economies.】

item.title: 在人工智能的帮助下，Sea 首席执行官李开复看到了通往 1 万亿美元市值的道路
item.description: Sea Ltd.的创始人Forrest Li告诉员工，随着东南亚电子商务领军企业加入全球科技公司的行列，该公司有可能实现万亿美元的市值— 增长约10倍—。【原文：Sea Ltd. founder Forrest Li told employees a trillion dollar market capitalization — an increase of about 10 times — is possible as the Southeast Asia e-commerce leader joins tech companies globally betting on artificial intelligence for growth.】

item.title: 据说 GCash 将把菲律宾破纪录的首次公开募股推迟到 2026 年下半年
item.description: 据知情人士透露，金融科技公司GCash的目标是在2026年下半年在马尼拉首次公开募股，由于菲律宾股市低迷，这一目标晚于此前的预期。【原文：Fintech firm GCash is aiming for an initial public offering in Manila in the second half of 2026, according to people with knowledge of the matter, later than previously anticipated as the Philippine stock market sags.】

item.title: 日本称正逐步减少对俄罗斯液化天然气的依赖
item.description: 日本贸易大臣重申，日本的目标是减少对俄罗斯液化天然气的依赖，但不能立即停止进口。【原文：Japan’s trade minister reiterated that the country aims to curb dependence on Russian liquefied natural gas, but can’t immediately halt imports.】

item.title: 贝莱德称保险公司有望继续加大私人赌注
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）的一项调查显示，作为平滑长期回报战略的一部分，管理着 23 万亿美元资金的保险公司计划增加更多的私人市场持股。【原文：Insurers overseeing $23 trillion plan to add even more to their private market holdings as part of a strategy to smooth long-term returns, according to a BlackRock Inc. survey.】

item.title: 据说海尔正在考虑物联网部门 Cosmoplat 的 IPO 事宜
item.description: 知情人士透露，海尔智能家居有限公司（Haier Smart Home Co.【原文：Haier Smart Home Co. is considering an initial public offering of its internet-of-things unit Cosmoplat, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 亿万富翁 Kakao 创始人涉嫌操纵股票罪名成立
item.description: 韩国一家法院驳回了针对 Kakao 公司创始人布莱恩-金（Brian Kim）的股票操纵案，为这位亿万富翁洗脱了有损其互联网先驱声誉的罪名。【原文：A South Korean court dismissed the stock manipulation case against Kakao Corp. founder Brian Kim, clearing the billionaire of charges that marred his reputation as an internet pioneer.】
